# The `DecIntegerState` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Specialization of the integer state for a decreasing value, hence 0 is the best state and ~0u the worst. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;typename base&#95;ty = uint32&#95;t&gt;
struct llvm::DecIntegerState&lt;base&#95;ty&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Specialization of the integer state for a decreasing value, hence 0 is the best state and ~0u the worst.

Definition at line 2863 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h">Attributor.h</a>.
